alert.note: Alert for De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Estancia Valley; Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Quay County; Union County; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 11 at 3:51PM MDT until October 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 7 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, Upper Rio Grande Valley, Estancia Valley, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, Union County, Harding County, Eastern San Miguel County, Quay County, and De Baca County. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 7 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Estancia Valley; Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Quay County; Union County; Upper Rio Grande Valley
